text: Savoy Estate is a suburb of Johannesburg, South Africa. It is located in Region E of the City of Johannesburg Metropolitan Municipality. ==History== Prior to the discovery of gold on the Witwatersrand in 1886, the suburb lay on land on one of the original farms called Syferfontein. It became a suburb in October 1948 and was originally owned by M.A. Zoccola who was from the Savoy region in Europe. ==References== Category:Johannesburg Region E
title: Savoy Estate
